PRODUCT_ADDED_TO_CART_MESSAGE: Product added to cart does not appear in the cart page after search.
CANNOT_FAVORITE_WITHOUT_ACCOUNT_MESSAGE: User should not be able to favorite items without an account and should be redirected to the login page.

INVALID_LOGIN_FROM_HOME_MESSAGE: Invalid login error message did not appear after attempting login with invalid credentials from the home page.
